title: Jess Shears and Dom Lever share photos of baby
text:
Love Island’s Jess and Dom are parents (Picture: Rex/Instagram)

Former Love Island stars Jess Shears and Dom Lever are loving being parents to their newborn baby.

The married couple, who got together on series three of the dating show, welcomed their first child together earlier this month.

So far, Dom and Jess are keeping quiet on the sex of their baby and its name, but while they have chosen to stay private on the details, they have been treating fans to the cutest photos of their bundle of joy.

Taking to her Instagram story on Saturday, Jess shared a sweet photo of her cradling her bubba in her arms.

And little Lever-Shears looked just adorable in white socks, a white top and little grey joggers.

Jess shared a cute new photo of her little one (Picture: Instagram)

Suggesting their baby was a little under the weather, Jess wrote across her snap: ‘My poorly little baby.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

She revealed herself and Dom had been visiting family in Manchester and were on their way to see their loved ones in her hometown of Devon.

Dom, meanwhile, shared a photo to his own Instagram story of him clutching his newborn’s hand.

Just so lovely, right?

The couple first announced they had become parents at the beginning of October, with Dom confirming the news by posting a photo of him carrying their baby out of the hospital alongside the caption: ‘Baby we did it.’

Since then, he and Jess have come under criticism, after he shared a picture of Jess appearing to be back in the gym just days after giving birth.

Dom was seen holding onto his newborn’s hand (Picture: Instagram)

Jess, however, hit back at fans and told them not to jump to conclusions – insisting they had no clue when the picture of her in the gym had actually been taken.

‘Can people stop assuming they know anything about the birth of our child,’ she said.

Then, pointing out: ‘Just because we chose to share an image yesterday doesn’t mean that’s when they were born.

‘Dom, baby and I are happy, healthy and recovering at our own rate.’

Well said.

description: Love Island stars Jess Shears and Dom Lever welcomed their first child together at the beginning of October.
